title: SmashCore AI
description: An autonomous agent for competitive gaming analysis and strategy.
longDescription: SmashCore AI processes thousands of gameplay videos to identify optimal strategies, character matchups, and player habits. It uses a combination of computer vision and reinforcement learning to provide actionable insights for professional gamers.

title: Generative Art Platform
description: A web-based platform for creating unique art using generative models.
longDescription: This platform allows users to input text prompts and style guides to generate high-resolution artwork. It utilizes fine-tuned diffusion models and offers a marketplace for users to sell their creations as NFTs.

title: E-commerce Automation
description: Automating inventory management for a large online retailer.
longDescription: Developed an AI-powered system that predicts sales trends, automates reordering processes, and optimizes stock levels across multiple warehouses. The solution reduced stockouts by 40% and carrying costs by 25%.

title: MarketMind
description: AI agent for real-time financial market sentiment analysis.
longDescription: MarketMind scrapes news articles, social media, and financial reports to provide a real-time sentiment score for various assets. It helps traders make informed decisions by filtering out noise and highlighting key market-moving information.
